TopicTitle: A list off all currently released mods since they don't seem to be posting them here

Articles.Content:
https://github.com/warior456/KSP-2-tools-and-mods

This repository tries to list all the mods, modloaders and tools that are currently available for Kerbal Space Program 2

57 minutes ago, Matteo_fey said:

https://github.com/warior456/KSP-2-tools-and-mods

This repository tries to list all the mods, modloaders and tools that are currently available for Kerbal Space Program 2

This has been attempted hundreds of times with ksp, it’s a completely fruitless endeavor. Once modding is officially supported, the number of mods is going to explode exponentially.  
 

Also, since this list is being listed here on the KSP forums, we ask that your list complies with add-on posting rules.   This includes verification that each mod listed has an appropriate and legal license, and each mod properly shows it source code. 

Edited February 26, 2023 by Gargamel

2 hours ago, Gargamel said:

This has been attempted hundreds of times with ksp, it’s a completely fruitless endeavor. Once modding is officially supported, the number of mods is going to explode exponentially.  
 

 

CKAN has done this and this list is only until CKAN starts with ksp2
 

 

2 hours ago, Gargamel said:

 

Also, since this list is being listed here on the KSP forums, we ask that your list complies with add-on posting rules.   This includes verification that each mod listed has an appropriate and legal license, and each mod properly shows it source code. 

We will try but since this is just a list linking to the official mod page the mod developers themselves are partially responsible for this. If you feel like the list breaks the rules feel free to remove this post or contact us

I hope modders will make proper posts on the forums later. Spacedock is a great hosting solution, but the forum threads are more informative and practical for troubleshooting for example.

Thanks a lot for compiling this list!

Lol. Lag reducer by massively downgrading visual quality is a mod?

Rockets less wobbly (maybe) is a mod?

I’m not trying to be rude or dash hopes. But IMO The game is in no state to be modding it in ways that updates will probably break soon anyway.

I play it but honestly it is barely even playable right now. I’ve had so many bugs that even basic trips to the mun become blind undertakings with more luck than skill involved.
